bibl.title: Prostima-Fines and Crop-Control under Ptolemy VIII. BGU VI 1420 Reconsidered in Light of the New Schubart-Column to P.Haun. inv 407.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The πρόστιμον-fine or qns explained. - πρόστιμα-fines for the taking of (extra) land and crop-control in the Schubart-column [P. Haun. Inv. 407; descr.: Kim Ryholt, A Greek-Demotic Temple Archive from Edfu Dating to the Reign of Ptolemy VIII, ZPE 190 (2014) p. 181, pl. 6]. - Schubart-column, lines 8-13, record of πρόστιμον-fine for taking land in year 28: 143/142 BC. - Schubart-column, lines 18-25, - further record of a πρόστιμον-fine for taking land, this time of lower value in year 29: 142/141 BC; - record of seizure of this land by the state in year 34: 137/136 BC. - A new interpretation for BGU VI 1420. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Katelijn Vandorpe & Dorothy J. Thompson, Prostima-Fines and Crop-Control under Ptolemy VIII. BGU VI 1420 Reconsidered in Light of the New Schubart-Column to P.Haun. inv 407.

Introduction. - The πρόστιμον-fine or qns explained. - πρόστιμα-fines for the taking of (extra) land and crop-control in the Schubart-column [P. Haun. Inv. 407; descr.: Kim Ryholt, A Greek-Demotic Temple Archive from Edfu Dating to the Reign of Ptolemy VIII, ZPE 190 (2014) p. 181, pl. 6]. - Schubart-column, lines 8-13, record of πρόστιμον-fine for taking land in year 28: 143/142 BC. - Schubart-column, lines 18-25, - further record of a πρόστιμον-fine for taking land, this time of lower value in year 29: 142/141 BC; - record of seizure of this land by the state in year 34: 137/136 BC. - A new interpretation for BGU VI 1420. - Conclusion.
